R

RandomPlayer - Class in com.goldasil.pjv.models
Represents a random player for the mode of the gameControllers Player Vs Computer The random player can generate possible moves, evaluate them to some extend, but chooses randomly from the pool of possible moves narrowed down to the best ones.
RandomPlayer(int) - Constructor for class com.goldasil.pjv.models.RandomPlayer
Generates a player with the specified ID and playing cards in hand.
Rank - Enum in com.goldasil.pjv.enums
Contains the ranks of cards in the German playing cards pack.
removeCards(ArrayList<Card>) - Method in class com.goldasil.pjv.models.Player
Removes the cards passed in in an array from the cards in a player's hand.
